subject: New TopCoder(R) Studio contest posted
body:
Hello sm1lies,

Two new TopCoder Studio contests are here.  

The TopCoder Press Room Prototype contest began at 4:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (UTC/GMT -4) on Tuesday, May 29, 2007.  The submission deadline for this contest is 4:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (UTC/GMT -4) on Tuesday, June 5, 2007.

This contest will award cash prizes totaling $3,000.00 to up to three (3) competitors. 

And check out a new type of creative contest: The Ball Sound Creation contest! 

This contest began at 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (UTC/GMT -4) on Tuesday, May 29, 2007.  The submission deadline for this contest is 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (UTC/GMT -4) on Tuesday, June 5, 2007.

The contest will award cash prizes totaling $1,500 to up to five (5) competitors.

For all of the contest details, check out http://studio.topcoder.com/?module=ViewActiveContests
 
Best of luck to you at the Studio! 


- The TopCoder Studio Team 


===================================================================
You have received this email because you indicated in your TopCoder profile that you want to be notified of TopCoder Studio and/or Graphic Design competitions.  If you no longer wish to receive these emails, log in to TopCoder or TopCoder Studio and click on 'Update My Profile'.  In the 'Email Notification' section of your profile, you have the option to enable or disable receipt of various types of emails.  Be sure to save any changes to your member profile.


http://studio.topcoder.com

703 Hebron Avenue
Glastonbury, CT 06033
